title: lAli lAli namma
sahitya:
lAli lAli namma hariye lAli


anupallavi

  sura nararige olidu karuNava bIruva doreya lAli


caraNam 1    rAma lAli meghashyAma lAli ramA manOhara amita sadguNadhAma lAli
    caraNam 2    krSNa lAli sarvOtkrSTa lAli duSTara shikSisi shiSTara poreva santuSTa lAli
    caraNam 3    ranga lAli mangaLAnga lAli gangeya paDeda tunga mahima narasinga lAli
    caraNam 4    nanda lAli gOpIkanda lAli mandara giridhara madhusUdana mukunda lAli
    caraNam 5    shUra lAli raNadhIra lAli mAranayya namma guru purandara viTTala lAli
